THE DIGITAL SOUTH @ UNC

ABOUT THE FEATURED SCHOLARS

This page is a directory for current UNC scholars researching the American South utilizing various digital methodologies. Scholars come from a myriad of departments across campus and have different approaches and questions, but ultimately they are all interested in advancing our understanding of the South through digital methods.

We will highlight a scholar every couple of days as a way to introduce them individually. Keep an eye out for our first post!
